review: It took me awhile to figure out how to work it but I love it! Have to force myself to turn it off at night and get to bed. With the same movies and shows on TV all the time, it was a great addition to my TV watching. I find it to be worth the money right now.
author: Smiling

review: I love this Firestick!  I have access to so much on my non-smart tv!!  No problems!
author: Amazon Customer

review: Excellent product. It only took minutes to set up
author: Patricia Winters-Baker

review: It does it's job and my son loves watching cartoons on prime videos. Plus it's cheaper in price then other streaming sticks and does the same job.
author: Stanley Flores

review: I recommend this product , it's simple and super easy to use ! And it's cheaper then cable every month !!! Subscribe to net flix and Hulu plus and your set . Tons to watch and then pandora is an option to . I haven't really went into it that much but I know there are games and much much more !!! Buy this !!! Best $40 I ever spent
author: Paola Errante

review: I was happy with this until they started putting advertisements in between the series I've been watching. EXTREMELY ANNOYING. Especially since it's 5 times louder than the program. I even was considering buying another one for our other tv, but if there's no way to stop this I won't. Give me a break Amazon. I buy tons of stuff from you and am a Prime member. That REALLY SUCKS.  Would have been  5 star rating. Now you get a 1.
author: BethA

review: Amazing! Just plug it in and wow no set up. I use this in a bedroom that doesn't have a smart tv. It works just as well and is faster that my smart tv,
author: T. Smith "Teresa"

review: Kept loosing a single so had to purchase a range extender
author: Virginia Kerbs

review: Best streaming product ever! Great price!!
author: Traci
